frameset.edef: coupling with, associating with, linking one thing with another

example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS بلغ) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC شوطا)) (SBAR (WHNP-4 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB لا) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC رجوع)) (PP-PRD (PREP عن) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-4)))))))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اقتران) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN_PROP ميري)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لم)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J تبق) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC راهبة))))))))))))

arg.g: by Mary who is no longer a nun
